content: 1/5 cat planet amigurumi this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2024 for personal use only do not copy sell alter or distribute this pattern or parts of it you may sell a limited number of your handmade finished items provided you credit icrochetthings as the designer copyright © 2024 icrochetthings 2/5 materials key dk weight yarn in purple pink chain = chain yellow light blue dark blue single_crochet = single_crochet 3 mm crochet hook increase = increase stuffing decrease = decrease scissors slip_stitch = slip_stitch yarn needle flo = front loop only blo = back loop only f/o = finish off x = repeat x = total number of stitches information contact size tall ravelry icrochetthings 3 etsy icrochetthings tumblr i-crochet-things copyright © 2024 icrochetthings 3/5 body - begin with purple - stuff as you go 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase around 18 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 24 5 3 single_crochet increase around 30 6 single_crochet around 30 7 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet around 36 8 single_crochet around 36 9 5 single_crochet increase around 42 10 11 single_crochet around 42 12 blo- single_crochet around 42 - the unused front loops from round 11 will be used later to make the rings 13 15 single_crochet around 42 16 5 single_crochet decrease around 36 17 single_crochet around 36 18 2 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet around 30 19 single_crochet around 30 20 3 single_crochet decrease around 24 21 single_crochet decrease single_crochet around 18 22 single_crochet decrease around 12 23 decrease around 6 - f/o sew shut rings - the rings will be made by working in the unused front loops from round 11 of the body - the body should be held upside-down when crocheting the rings in order to orient the stitches correctly - make a slip knot with pink yarn and slide it onto the hook 1 starting from the last stitch of round 11 of the body flo- slip_stitch around 42 2 blo- 3 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet around 48 - break off pink and attach yellow 3 flo- slip_stitch around 48 4 blo- 7 single_crochet increase around 54 - break off yellow and attach light blue 5 flo- slip_stitch around 54 6 blo- 4 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet around 60 - f/o weave in loose ends copyright © 2024 icrochetthings 4/5 ears x 2 - begin with purple 1 work 5 single_crochet in a magic_ring 5 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet increase 7 3 2 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase 9 4 3 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet increase 11 - f/o leave long tail for sewing paws x 4 - begin with purple 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet around 6 - f/o leave long tail for sewing tail - begin with purple 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 6 single_crochet around 6 - f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2024 icrochetthings 5/5 assembly sew the ears
